title: The Big Thompson Flood July 31, 1976
description: Photo journal of the Big Thompson Flood near Estes Park, CO July 31, 1976. Photo Essays include; A Nightmare of Death and Destruction, by Tim Asbury; The Big Thompson, Before and After, by Jay Harris; In Search Of Higher Ground; How Much Is Enough, by Dave Knapp; Helping Those Who Help, by Major Mervyn L. Morelock; American Red Cross For Fast Fast Fast Relief; ...Flood Briefs... CBers Assist; and more, pictures, history, and list of victims
author: Don (editor) Cotten
